summary: Recipe app with international food catalog, categorized by country and food types, displaying recipes with step-by-step instructions and user upload functionality
architectural_notes: Recipe data structured by country and food type categories
Food items include image URLs for displaying photos
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Appetizing photo of Spanish churros with chocolate dipping sauce (churros.dim_400x300.png)
- Colorful photo of Japanese mochi ice cream balls in various flavors (mochi-ice-cream.dim_400x300.png)
- Photo of Canadian Timbits donut holes in assorted flavors (timbits.dim_400x300.png)
- Golden Portuguese pastel de nata custard tarts (pastel-de-nata.dim_400x300.png)

existing_features.title: Build a food catalog page displaying all food items as cards with name, country tag, food type tag, and a Recipe button
Implement filtering controls to allow users to filter food items by country and food type
Create a recipe view that displays step-by-step instructions when the Recipe button is pressed
Build a user upload form allowing users to submit new food recipes with all required fields
Design a professional UI with a cohesive color scheme using warm earth tones (terracotta, sage green, cream) with clear typography and generous spacing to create an inviting culinary aesthetic

Modify the FoodCard component in frontend/src/components/FoodCard.tsx to display the food photo above the food name when imageUrl is available, using an img element with appropriate styling that matches the warm earth tone design
Add an imageUrl field to the UploadRecipeForm component in frontend/src/components/UploadRecipeForm.tsx, allowing users to optionally provide an image URL when submitting new recipes
Render the generated food photos as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated/ directory and reference them in the FoodCard component using relative paths

new_feature_requests.summary: Food catalog with international items categorized by country
Food type classification (sweets, ice cream, snacks, etc.)
User upload functionality for food recipes

Populate the backend with a comprehensive collection of real international food recipes covering multiple countries and food types, including authentic dish names, descriptions, and detailed step-by-step cooking instructions
Update the seed function in backend/main.mo to include these real recipes instead of placeholder data
Display a photo of each food item alongside its name
Update the FoodItem type in backend/main.mo to include an optional imageUrl field of type ?Text to store the URL or path to the food photo
